projects.title: Hand Stem Player
projects.description: A stem player is a device that allows you to separate songs into 'stems' and control them. This project is written in Python and uses OpenCV and Mediapipe to track the hands. Pinching the fingers allows you to control the stem volumes. This stem player supports isolating bass, drums, vocals and backing audio and is seperated using Demucs by Meta

projects.title: Exercise Tracker
projects.description: A fullstack no-frills exercise tracker i made for myself. It uses react for the front end and Flask and postgreSQL on the backend to handle data. I made this as many alternatives required a subscription or had to many ads/bloat.

projects.title: Unemployment Rate Predictor
projects.description: This project uses a LSTM neural network to predict the unemployment rate in Australia. The data is from the ABS and is trained on the unemployment, inflation and interest rate from 1991 to 2025. The model is written in Python and uses Pytorch and flask on the backend. The content was dockerized and runs on Google Cloud Run.

projects.title: Macro AI
projects.description: Another interest of mine is health and fitness. This project uses ChatGPT API to give an estimate of calories and protein from a description or an image of a meal. This project was also my first React app. Test with the website out below!

projects.title: Spotify CD Visualiser
projects.description: I made this spotify visualiser with React and the Spotify API. It displays the users current song and queue as CDs, animating the currently playing CD. The website hosting doesn't work for other users as spotify won't take my API out of dev mode but it's still cool :)

projects.title: Gesture Controlled Mouse
projects.description: I was really interested in ways to interact with computers through physical means. So, using hand tracking and a webcam, I made it so you can control the mouse by moving your hand and click with your fingers. Written in python and uses OpenCV and Mediapipe.
